Package entity.board.observer

Class ClientBoardObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.board.observer.ClientBoardObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardObserver
    public class ClientBoardObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardObserver
    Class that represents a board observer, which handles board updates on the client side. It also contains a copy of the board, as it might be initialized on the server side and not visible by the client.
    Author:
    Aliaksei Kouzel
